title: Auxiliary Set
description: Auxiliary Set is a file-set that hosts raw data files (e.g. FASTQs) that result from sequencing of nucleic acids from a sample that are a proxy to some vital information and necessary for the analysis of the experiment it is connected to in the Measurement Set. Auxiliary sets usually would not provide any information about the transcriptome or the genome of the sample in question. For example AuxiliarySets would include the sequencing of barcodes that correspond to elements introduced into cells, or sequencing of guide RNA coding sequences in the cells. The files hosted in the AuxiliarySets are relevant for the Analysis, but they by themselves are not assessig much of the biology of the sample being analyzed.

file_set_type.description: The category that best describes this auxiliary file set.
file_set_type.comment: File set type describes the content of the construct library set. Cell hashing is the antibody barcoding of cell batches. Cell sorting is data collected during fluorescence activated cell sorting. Circularized RNA barcode detection is reporter detection (such as for MPRA) through sequencing circularized barcoded RNA molecules. gRNA sequencing is sequencing data of guide RNAs. Oligo-conjugated lipids are lipid- and cholesterol-modified oligonucleotides. Quantification DNA barcode sequencing is sequencing data of barcodes, such as for MPRA. Variant sequencing is sequencing data of genomic DNA sequences with variants introduced.

library_construction_platform.title: Library Construction Platform
library_construction_platform.description: The platform used to construct the library sequenced in this auxiliary set.
